pullrequest.title: Improve display detection for jenkins homebrew jobs

content.raw:
Here's a better example, with multiple users running X:
~~~
t1000:~ osrf$ ps ax | grep X
  226   ??  S      0:12.13 /Applications/Utilities/XQuartz.app/Contents/MacOS/X11.bin -psn_0_32776
  301   ??  S      0:00.00 /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/launchd_startx /opt/X11/bin/startx -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz
  302   ??  S      0:00.01 /bin/sh /opt/X11/bin/startx -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz
  354   ??  S      0:00.01 /opt/X11/bin/xinit /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/xinitrc -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :0 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/jenkins/.serverauth.302
  355   ??  S      0:00.01 /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :0 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/jenkins/.serverauth.302
  367   ??  S      0:00.27 /opt/X11/bin/quartz-wm
  469   ??  Ss     0:00.03 com.apple.appstore.PluginXPCService
57425   ??  S      0:01.27 /Applications/Utilities/XQuartz.app/Contents/MacOS/X11.bin -psn_0_839885
57472   ??  S      0:00.05 /opt/X11/bin/xterm
57473   ??  S      0:00.00 /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/launchd_startx /opt/X11/bin/startx -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz
57474   ??  S      0:00.01 /bin/sh /opt/X11/bin/startx -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz
57556   ??  Ss     0:00.00 /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/privileged_startx -d /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/privileged_startx.d
57596   ??  S      0:00.00 /opt/X11/bin/xinit /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/xinitrc -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :1 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/osrf/.serverauth.57474
57597   ??  S      0:00.01 /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :1 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/osrf/.serverauth.57474
57605   ??  S      0:00.05 /opt/X11/bin/quartz-wm
57733 s000  S+     0:00.00 grep X
~~~

Here's a better example, with multiple users running X:

t1000:~ osrf$ ps ax | grep X
  226   ??  S      0:12.13 /Applications/Utilities/XQuartz.app/Contents/MacOS/X11.bin -psn_0_32776
  301   ??  S      0:00.00 /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/launchd_startx /opt/X11/bin/startx -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz
  302   ??  S      0:00.01 /bin/sh /opt/X11/bin/startx -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz
  354   ??  S      0:00.01 /opt/X11/bin/xinit /opt/X11/lib/X11/xinit/xinitrc -- /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :0 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/jenkins/.serverauth.302
  355   ??  S      0:00.01 /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :0 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/jenkins/.serverauth.302
  367   ??  S      0:00.27 /opt/X11/bin/quartz-wm
  469   ??  Ss     0:00.03 com.apple.appstore.PluginXPCService
57425   ??  S      0:01.27 /Applications/Utilities/XQuartz.app/Contents/MacOS/X11.bin -psn_0_839885

57597   ??  S      0:00.01 /opt/X11/bin/Xquartz :1 -nolisten tcp -auth /Users/osrf/.serverauth.57474
